meanings: (어떤 장소에) be, (건물 등이) stand, be located (in/at), be situated, (도시 등이) lie
(시설·장치 등이) have, (시설이) be equipped with, be provided with
feel ill at ease in the presence of the ladies

phrases.phrase: 그럼, YBM사가 우리와 계약을 맺어 함께 일할 수 있기를 바랍시다!
meanings: 직장에서의 표현 Yeah, let's just hope YBM plays ball with us now!

vlive.korean: 근데 또 밝을 때도 있기 때문에 그렇게 막 내성적이고 조용한 성격은... But sometimes, I'm outgoing. So I'm not too calm and introvert. 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: But sometimes, I'm outgoing. So I'm not too calm and introvert.

vlive.korean: 전화가 없구나 - 전화가 있긴 하나요? - 다시! 거기 1980년대라고요? There's no phone then. - Is there a phone? - Again! - It's the year 1980? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: There's no phone then. - Is there a phone? - Again! - It's the year 1980?

vlive.korean: 제일 쉽지 - 맞아 왜냐하면 사골육수가 있기 때문에 - 진짜... It's the easiest one. - Yeah, because you already have the beef bone soup. - Really. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.6
vlive.english: It's the easiest one. - Yeah, because you already have the beef bone soup. - Really.

examples.korean: We were hoping we could go sledging. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 썰매를 탈[타러 갈] 수 있기를 바라고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The divers hoped to unlock some of the secrets of the seabed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 잠수부들은 해저의 비밀들 중 일부를 드러낼 수 있기를 바랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
